_comment: Feature flags for Sentinel Quantum Vanguard AI Pro

_principles.defensive_only: All features are monitoring, audit, and alerting only
_principles.local_data: Data is stored locally by default
_principles.all_disableable: All modules can be disabled via feature flags

_module_descriptions.soc_live: Personal SOC - local security event monitoring
_module_descriptions.phone_security: Legal phone spam detection and call monitoring
_module_descriptions.local_audit: Local security audit and permissions check
_module_descriptions.institution_mode: Institutional compliance mode (neutral vocabulary, no emojis)

_legal_compliance.no_attacks: No attack code or offensive capabilities
